TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Salinas Historic Self-Guided Tour App!\n\nDiscover beautiful Salinas California, where you'll find historic sites, unspoiled farmland, a quaint, historic downtown, and some of the friendliest people around. Salinas is famous for agriculture and our fresh, home-grown produce is available around the world. We are also known for the best year-round climate in the entire North American continent, and have some of the cleanest air in the United States of America!
